issue.title: Cannot launch on first install on Ubuntu 18.04

content.raw:
Yes it is ubuntu 18.04.

I haven’t installed this package :disappointed:  

I followed the install on the [README](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/default/#markdown-header-binary-install) of this repo which install only the library, I just copy past not looked carefully enough to see I only installed the library. After that I was unable to launch the simulator.

‌

Still after the install, GUI is not starting:

content.html:
Yes it is ubuntu 18.04.

I haven’t installed this package

I followed the install on the README of this repo which install only the library, I just copy past not looked carefully enough to see I only installed the library. After that I was unable to launch the simulator.

‌
